meanings.sent1: The artist used viridian to paint the leaves of the tree.
meanings.sent2: The viridian walls of the house stood out in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The viridian crayon rolled off the table and onto the floor, leaving a trail of green.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like viridian jewels in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The viridian grass swayed gently in the breeze, creating a peaceful scene.

meanings.definition: A pigment or dye of a bright bluish-green color.
meanings.sent1: The artist mixed viridian with other colors to create a unique shade.
meanings.sent2: The viridian dye gave the fabric a vibrant and eye-catching hue.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally spilled viridian pigment into the soup, turning it an interesting color.
meanings.sent4: The sky at dusk was painted with streaks of viridian and gold.
meanings.sent5: The viridian paint on the canvas seemed to glow with its own light.
